title: IS_ENTITY_ATTACHED
content:
0xB346476EF1A648970xEC1479D5// IsEntityAttached
BOOL IS_ENTITY_ATTACHED(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to check if it is attached to another entity.Returns: Whether the entity is attached to another entity.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local ped = PlayerPedId()

if IsEntityAttached(ped) then
    DetachEntity(ped, true, true)
end
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()

if IsEntityAttached(ped) then
    DetachEntity(ped, true, true)
end

local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_ENTITY_ATTACHED
IsEntityAttached(entity)
